verses.verse: And it came to pass, when all the kings <WH4428> which were on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, in the hills <WH2022>, and in the valleys <WH8219>, and in all the coasts <WH2348> of the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> over against <WH4136> Lebanon <WH3844>, the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Amorite <WH567>, the Kanahanite <WH3669>, the Perizzite <WH6522>, the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Y'vusi <WH2983>, heard <WH8085> <WH8800> thereof;
That they gathered <WH6908> <WH8691> themselves together <WH3162>, to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> with Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> and with Yisra'EL <WH3478>, with one <WH259> accord <WH6310>.
And when the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Giv`on <WH1391> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> what Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> had done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto Yericho <WH3405> and to Ai <WH5857>,

They did work <WH6213> <WH8799> wilily <WH6195>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> and made as if they had been ambassadors <WH6737> <WH8691>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> old <WH1087> sacks <WH8242> upon their asses <WH2543>, and wine <WH3196> bottles <WH4997>, old <WH1087>, and rent <WH1234> <WH8794>, and bound up <WH6887> <WH8794>;

And old <WH1087> shoes <WH5275> and clouted <WH2921> <WH8794> upon their feet <WH7272>, and old <WH1087> garments <WH8008> upon them; and all the bread <WH3899> of their provision <WH6718> was dry <WH3001> <WH8804> and mouldy <WH5350>.

And they went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> unto the camp <WH4264> at Gilgal <WH1537>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, and to the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, We be come <WH935> <WH8804> from a far <WH7350> country <WH776>: now therefore make <WH3772> <WH8798> ye a league <WH1285> with us.

And the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the Hivites <WH2340>, Peradventure <WH194> ye dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> among <WH7130> us; and how shall we make <WH3772> <WH8799> a league <WH1285> with you?

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, We are thy servants <WH5650>. And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Who are ye? and from whence <WH370> come <WH935> <WH8799> ye?

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, From a very <WH3966> far <WH7350> country <WH776> thy servants <WH5650> are come <WH935> <WH8804> because of the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: for we have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the fame <WH8089> of him, and all that he did <WH6213> <WH8804> in Egypt <WH4714>,

And all that he did <WH6213> <WH8804> to the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, that were beyond <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, to Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, and to Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, which was at Ashtaroth <WH6252>.

Wherefore our elders <WH2205> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of our country <WH776> spake <WH559> <WH8799> to us, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> victuals <WH6720> with you <WH3027> for the journey <WH1870>, and go <WH3212> <WH8798> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> them, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, We are your servants <WH5650>: therefore now make <WH3772> <WH8798> ye a league <WH1285> with us.

This our bread <WH3899> we took hot <WH2525> for our provision <WH6679> <WH8694> out of our houses <WH1004> on the day <WH3117> we came forth <WH3318> <WH8800> to go <WH3212> <WH8800> unto you; but now, behold, it is dry <WH3001> <WH8804>, and it is mouldy <WH5350>:

And these bottles <WH4997> of wine <WH3196>, which we filled <WH4390> <WH8765>, were new <WH2319>; and, behold, they be rent <WH1234> <WH8694>: and these our garments <WH8008> and our shoes <WH5275> are become old <WH1086> <WH8804> by reason of the very <WH3966> long <WH7230> journey <WH1870>.
And the men <WH582> took <WH3947> <WH8799> of their victuals <WH6718>, and asked <WH7592> <WH8804> not counsel at the mouth <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> made <WH6213> <WH8799> peace <WH7965> with them, and made <WH3772> <WH8799> a league <WH1285> with them, to let them live <WH2421> <WH8763>: and the princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> sware <WH7650> <WH8735> unto them.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7097> of three <WH7969> days <WH3117> after <WH310> they had made <WH3772> <WH8804> a league <WH1285> with them, that they heard <WH8085> <WH8799> that they were their neighbours <WH7138>, and that they dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> among <WH7130> them.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> unto their cities <WH5892> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>. Now their cities <WH5892> were Giv`on <WH1391>, and Chephirah <WH3716>, and Beeroth <WH881>, and Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> smote <WH5221> <WH8689> them not, because the princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> had sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them by the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>. And all the congregation <WH5712> murmured <WH3885> <WH8735> against the princes <WH5387>.

But all the princes <WH5387> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the congregation <WH5712>, We have sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them by the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: now therefore we may <WH3201> <WH8799> not touch <WH5060> <WH8800> them.
This we will do <WH6213> <WH8799> to them; we will even let them live <WH2421> <WH8687>, lest wrath <WH7110> be upon us, because of the oath <WH7621> which we sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them.

And the princes <WH5387> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Let them live <WH2421> <WH8799>; but let them be hewers <WH2404> <WH8802> of wood <WH6086> and drawers <WH7579> <WH8802> of water <WH4325> unto all the congregation <WH5712>; as the princes <WH5387> had promised <WH1696> <WH8765> them.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for them, and he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Wherefore have ye beguiled <WH7411> <WH8765> us, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, We are very <WH3966> far <WH7350> from you; when ye dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> among <WH7130> us?

Now therefore ye are cursed <WH779> <WH8803>, and there shall none of you be freed <WH3772> <WH8735> from being bondmen <WH5650>, and hewers <WH2404> <WH8802> of wood <WH6086> and drawers <WH7579> <WH8802> of water <WH4325> for the house <WH1004> of my 'Elohim <WH430>.

And they answered <WH6030> <WH8799> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Because it was certainly <WH5046> <WH8715> told <WH5046> <WH8717> thy servants <WH5650>, how that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> his servant <WH5650> Mosheh <WH4872> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> you all the land <WH776>, and to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you, therefore we were sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of our lives <WH5315> because <WH6440> of you, and have done <WH6213> <WH8799> this thing <WH1697>.
And now, behold, we <WH2009> are in thine hand <WH3027>: as it seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> and right <WH3477> unto thee to do <WH6213> <WH8800> unto us, do <WH6213> <WH8798>.
And so did <WH6213> <WH8799> he unto them, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that they slew <WH2026> <WH8804> them not.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> made <WH5414> <WH8799> them that day <WH3117> hewers <WH2404> <WH8802> of wood <WH6086> and drawers <WH7579> <WH8802> of water <WH4325> for the congregation <WH5712>, and for the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068>, even unto this day <WH3117>, in the place <WH4725> which he should choose <WH977> <WH8799>.
